Articles.Content:
Okay guys this is my first challenge- enjoy:

Make a vehicle of any form with no control surfaces (RCS allowed) and land it on top of every building in the space centre.

Details:

All stock parts

NO mechjeb to help you land

All buildings in one flight

You do not need to land on the launch pad or runway

No cheats / debug menu

Difficulty Levels:

Easy: The vehicle must carry 1 kerbal (![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

Medium: The vehicle must carry 3 kerbals (![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif):)![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

Hard: The vehicle must carry 5 kerbals (![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif):)![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif):)![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-05T02:34:51Z" title="04/05/2015 02:34  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 5, 2015</time> by Byronicus**
  
Added difficulty
Time to get the debug menu open.

> 
> Time to get the debug menu open.

Gravity is for chumps.

> 
> Gravity is for chumps.

It doesn't exist ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
Guys i though i would not have to mention no cheats / debug menu

> 
> Guys i though i would not have to mention no cheats / debug menu

Everybody plays by the rules in challenges. No rules stating no debug menu means we can use it.

Whatever.

This challenge was set for you to challege yourself, not as a compettion

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_jpieFnT8fE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Done it for other challenge some time ago, link in the video's description.

Hmmm I think I have the perfect craft for this challenge. It has no SAS:

![B2AB1B3174D1405D2C3341E1C797E083B7E94C3D](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/3278920920637620233/B2AB1B3174D1405D2C3341E1C797E083B7E94C3D/)

![6jej9c.jpg](http://i61.tinypic.com/6jej9c.jpg)

I will give it a go.

MJ

How do you make the moving images

Also, have some rep

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T23:27:25Z" title="04/07/2015 11:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by Byronicus**

> 
> Hmmm I think I have the perfect craft for this challenge...
> ![6jej9c.jpg](http://i61.tinypic.com/6jej9c.jpg)

Cool vehicle, it reminds me of the lunar lander research vehicle:

![602px-LLRV_2.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ac/LLRV_2.jpg/602px-LLRV_2.jpg)

> 
> How do you make the moving images
> Also, have some rep

 He he, thanks. I used Kronal vessel viewer to take some low res images at different angles then used an online gif maker to string them together.

If that made no sense to you, let me know!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Cool vehicle, it reminds me of the lunar lander research vehicle:
> [http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ac/LLRV_2.jpg/602px-LLRV_2.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/ac/LLRV_2.jpg/602px-LLRV_2.jpg)

It is a similar vehicle IRL: 

![flying_bedstead.jpg](http://www.daviddarling.info/images/flying_bedstead.jpg)

The Rolls Royce thrust measuring rig.
